changelog: Version 2.4.1: Enhanced RGB Trigger processing and configuration, added custom RGB value support for personalized trigger settings. Version 2.4.0: Added Ferrum API support for keyboard and mouse control, enhanced UI with additional features, improved RGB Trigger functionality, and updated configuration options. Previous versions include: Config tab enhancements with DEL action and clipboard-driven import, ADS FOV feature with toggle/hold modes, config export/import functionality, HSV preview with eyedropper tool, and comprehensive mouse module refactoring.
